description: Try our easy to follow Chargrilled Pineapple with Waffles & Hot Butter Rum Sauce recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Chargrilled Pineapple with Waffles & Hot Butter Rum Sauce Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine butter, cream, sugar and rum in a small saucepan. Bring to the boil over medium heat, stirring constantly. Continue stirring for 5 minutes or until sauce has slightly thickened. Keep warm.
Cut pineapple into wedges. Trim off core and cut into pieces.
Combine sugar and cardamom in a bowl. Sprinkle over both sides of the pineapple pieces.
Heat a chargrill plate (or grill) on mediumhigh heat. Cook pineapple pieces for about 2 minutes each side or until golden.
Toast waffles and top with pineapple pieces, a scoop of icecream and rum sauce. Serve immediately.
